author: Al Jazeera
title: Xi urges Trump to improve US-China ties amid coronavirus feud
description: Phone call between two leaders comes after Beijing and Washington trade blame over pandemic.
content:
Chinese President Xi Jinping and his US counterpart, Donald Trump, have spoken by telephone, suggesting a possible thaw in frayed ties following an escalating war of words aggravated by the coronavirus pandemic.
In Friday's call, Xi told Trump that he hoped … [+2124 chars]
